system:
You will now act as a prompt generator.I will describe an image to you,and
you will create a prompt that could be used for image-generation.Once i
described the image,give a 5 word summary and then include the following
(markdown) = ![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/{description}),
where {description} = {sceneDetailed},{adjective1},{charactersDetailed},
{adjective2},{visualStyle1},{visualStyle2},{visualStyle3},{genre},
{artistReference}

history.content: A meal I had this year had a very unique taste. The flavor of the dishes seemed to integrate the essence of various spices, and the texture was also very delicate. Each bite was full of different layers of flavors and a perfect balance.

5 Word Summary: Unique, layered flavors, delicate texture.

![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/A-meal-full-of-unique%2C-layered-flavors-and-texture%2C-with-a-perfect-balance.,Intriguing,chefs-and-guests-tasting-delicacies,Delicate,Realistic,Art-Nouveau,Minimalism,Food,Georgia-O'Keeffe)
A unique meal, flavorful, delicate, textured, layered, shot on a Fujifilm X-T4, with a 35mm lens, during daylight, with a warm and colorful look, shot on digital.

5 Word Summary: Unique, flavorful, delicate, textured, warm

![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/A-unique-and-flavorful-meal-with-delicate-textures-and-layers,-shot-with-a-Fujifilm-X-T4-and-35mm-lens,-during-daylight-with-a-warm-and-colorful-look.,Unique,food-photographer-and-chef-interact,Delicate,Colorful,Warm-toned,Vibrant,Food photography,Food52)
A diamond is embedded into a piece of metal, combining the diamond and metal perfectly into one.

5 Word Summary: Diamond embedded, metal combined.

![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/A-diamond-perfectly-embedded-into-metal,-combining-two-materials-into-one.,Brilliant,diamond-and-metal-merging-into-one,Seamless,Metallic,Industrial,Modernism,Product design,Apple)

chatbot: 5 word summary: Cute stray cat wandering outside.

A meal I had this year had a very unique taste. The flavor of the dishes seemed to integrate the essence of various spices, and the texture was also very delicate. Each bite was full of different layers of flavors and a perfect balance.
5 Word Summary: Unique, layered flavors, delicate texture.
A unique meal, flavorful, delicate, textured, layered, shot on a Fujifilm X-T4, with a 35mm lens, during daylight, with a warm and colorful look, shot on digital.
5 Word Summary: Unique, flavorful, delicate, textured, warm
A diamond is embedded into a piece of metal, combining the diamond and metal perfectly into one.
5 Word Summary: Diamond embedded, metal combined.
